confirmation.title: Confirmation required
confirmation.content: Please confirm the execution of the selected action

error.unexpected: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later.

dateTime.invalid: Please select a valid date and time.

invalid.range: Please enter a number between {{min}} and {{max}}.

add.error: An error has occurred when adding the {{entity}}

delete.error: An error has occurred when deleting the {{entity}}

edit.error: An error has occurred when updating the {{entity}}

save.error: An error has occurred when assigning the {{toBeAssigned}} to the {{assignedTo}}

error.tooManyRequests: Too many login requests. Try again later.

message.part1: We've sent you an email to verify your email adress and activate your account.
message.part2: Click on the link in that email to complete your signup. If you don't see it, you may need to check your spam folder.

inUse.statement: The email address you entered is already in use.
inUse.callToAction: Please use a different email address or log in with the existing one.

verified.message: Your email adress has been successfully verified. Your account is now activated.

registration.error: An error has occurred during registration

password.notMatching: The two passwords you entered do not match. Please ensure that they are identical.
password.tooShort: Please enter a password with at least {{min}} characters

init.instruction: Enter your email adress and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

message.part1: We've sent you an email with further instructions to reset your password.
message.part2: If you don't see it, you may need to check your spam folder.

success.message: Your password has been successfully changed.

message.part1: An error has occurred when resetting your password.
message.part2: Make sure that you are using the correct and complete link from the email. Only the last link sent is valid. The link is valid for 24 hours.

instruction.desktop: Use the mouse to move the logo into the small circle
instruction.mobile: Use your finger to move the logo into the small circle

error.createCaptcha: An unexpected error has occurred when creating a CAPTCHA
error.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Try again later.
